CustomField.description: The next visit 7d past Previous to Last Visit
CustomField.formula: IF (Last_Previous_Donation__c != NULL && Last_Previous_Scheduled_Visit__c != NULL, FROMUNIXTIME(MAX(UNIXTIMESTAMP(Last_Previous_Donation__r.Donation_Complete__c + 7), UNIXTIMESTAMP(Last_Previous_Scheduled_Visit__r.Appointment_Datetime__c + 7))), IF (Last_Previous_Donation__c != NULL, Last_Previous_Donation__r.Donation_Complete__c + 7, Last_Previous_Scheduled_Visit__r.Appointment_Datetime__c + 7 ) )
CustomField.label: Next Visit Option 7d
